Note: The Linn-Benton Loop service began in July 2002.
LBCC IDs were accepted as a bus pass starting in July 2002.
OSU IDs were accepted as a bus pass starting in July 2004.
Samaritan Health Employee IDs were accepted as a bus pass starting in November 2008.
The Loop Original route began to run on Saturdays.
All rides were fareless starting in April 2020 so ticket type and group information were no longer collected.
